nodes.text: Veran Anjek was a male cyborg Rattataki gladiator living during Galactic War. In 3631 BBY he fought in the Grand Arena on Zakuul alongside Kordath and Calo Arawan against Bowdaar and the Alliance Commander, in a match arranged by Valdos Dofine. Veran Anjek's side lost the fight and all three were killed in the match.
Veran Anjek appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire during Bowdaar Alliance alert mission.
